團.definition: round; lump; ball; to roll into a ball; to gather; regiment; group; society; classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

團團轉.definition: to go round and round; running around in circles; fig. frantically busy

團年.definition: (of a family) to come together at lunar New Year's Eve; family reunion at New Year's

團建.definition: team building (abbr. for 團隊建設|团队建设[tuan2 dui4 jian4 she4]); building camaraderie within the Chinese Communist Youth League 中國共產主義青年團|中国共产主义青年团[Zhong1 guo2 Gong4 chan3 zhu3 yi4 Qing1 nian2 tuan2]

團滅.definition: (video gaming) to eliminate an entire team; to get wiped out

團結一致.definition: see 團結一心|团结一心[tuan2 jie2 yi1 xin1]

團結就是力量.pinyin: tuán jié jiù shì lì liàng
團結就是力量.definition: unity is strength (revolutionary slogan and popular song of 1943)

團練.definition: local militia formed to suppress peasant rebellion (old)

團聚.definition: to reunite; to have a reunion

團購.definition: group buying; collective buying; buying by a group of individuals who negotiate a discount for the group

團長.definition: regimental command; head of a delegation; group buy organizer; group-buying coordinator

團隊精神.definition: group mentality; collectivism; solidarity; team spirit

團風.definition: Tuanfeng county in Huanggang 黃岡|黄冈[Huang2 gang1], Hubei

團風縣.definition: Tuanfeng county in Huanggang 黃岡|黄冈[Huang2 gang1], Hubei
